name: .CLK File Extension
summary: Learn about .CLK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by Corel R.A.V.E, an object-based animation program used to create animated graphics; contains text, images, and other objects, such as buttons and custom shapes; also includes animation settings.

content: CLK files are often used to create animations and movies for Web pages. Corel R.A.V.E. is similar to the Adobe Flash development environment and can export movies to Adobe's .SWF format.
NOTE: Corel discontinued Corel R.A.V.E after version 3. It was last offered as a program in the CorelDRAW Graphics Suite version 12 software package.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
